review: Everything I expected, and more. I've completely eliminated cable with the use of my FireStick!
author: matt hull

review: It did what we wanted it to do.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I never knew about this technology. Now I don't have to connect my laptop. I love this product! My son bought it for me.  I can now watch movies from my TV by using WiFi.
author: zenobia Rhyner

review: It took less then tem minutes for this senior citizen to get it up and running and to watch my first movie. FANTASTIC!!!
author: Julieann

review: Absolutely love love this product! I am so glad I purchased. I don't have any cable in my home and I was able to install this very easy!
author: Lee N Heredia

review: I'm liking it so far.  We've had it hooked up for about a week.  I also have a Roku and there's a huge difference in the search option.  Roku shows me everything available while the Fire stick is consistently pushing Amazon only content at me.
author: Jaime

review: Remote is nice but I like the chromecast better.
author: MacGyver

review: Love it! Incredibly easy to use, particularly with the app for you phone
author: garbageman
